H0.text: Which member of the British royal family married on the 29th April 2011. Prince William

H1.text: Which member of the British royal family married on the 29th April 2011. Prince Harry

H2.text: Which member of the British royal family married on the 29th April 2011. Prince Andrew

H3.text: Which member of the British royal family married on the 29th April 2011. Prince Billy

A4.text: The wedding took place in Westminster Abbey on 29 April 2011.

A5.text: William and Catherine used Nottingham Cottage as their London residence until 2013.
